ðŸ“– Summary: RustFS is a high-performance distributed object storage system built with Rust, aiming to be an alternative to MinIO. It offers features like S3 compatibility, support for data lakes, and a user-friendly experience, all while being open-source under the Apache 2.0 license. RustFS is currently under rapid development and not recommended for production use.
